Package algorithms.util

Class PolygonAndPointPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.util.PolygonAndPointPlotter
  • public class PolygonAndPointPlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    writes an html file using the d3.js library. https://github.com/d3/ which has a BSD 3-clause "New" or "Revised" License https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/LICENSE first implemented in projects https://github.com/nking/two-point-correlation w/ Copyright (c) 2013-2015 Nichole King http://nking.github.io/two-point-correlation/ using The MIT License (MIT) and https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations w/ Copyright (c) 2014 Climb With Your Feet and using The MIT License (MIT) then moved to this shared library project which has the same copyright and license.
    Author:
    nichole
